entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Rosetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:01 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rosetown Airport 01:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -17.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -20.0°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Fog. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:03 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Fog dissipating. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 01:03 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:03 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
